participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a love for animals and a passion for self-expression.
participant_1.background: I enjoy Halloween because I get to dress up as animals. I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends. My shyness made me panic and I didn't show up. I went to an elite Ivy League school. I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, with a passion for writing and a love for animals, especially cats.
participant_2.background: My height is average for my age. I practice vegetarianism. I need to move because my convertible is not practical for driving to school. I am a cat lover who enjoys making organic cat food for my furry friend. I'm writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! I'm a big fan of cats too. I have a calico named Mittens.
Oh cool, cats are the best! I have a Siamese named Shadow.
What a beautiful name! I like to dye my hair red, what is your hair color?
Mine is black. I have a bold hair color too!
Wow, I wish I could rock the black hair look. I always go back to red.
I like it when people have unique hair colors.
I wanted to join a ski club, but my shyness made me panic. Do you ski?
I do! I ski every winter. It's the best way to spend a day off.
I wish I could ski. I'm not good with heights.
It's a lot of fun. You should give it a try!
I'll think about it. I'm a bit scared, but maybe I'll get over it.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
